name: for love is heartbreak
description:
a visual novel about losing someone you loved.

they're still out there, one of the 8 billion people on this planet-- but they are no longer by your side.

this is the story of us: would you let her go? or would you keep clinging on, for the tiny chance that she might, just might, come back?

made for the girl i used to love.

NOTICES

- fullscreen web has a bug with the title screen UI! if you choose to play full screen on web, please press "play" then go full screen :)

- inspired by you left me - angela he :D

- please tell me any feedback you have!! if you break the game or find errors you get extra points(v easy to do) -- discord.gg/YtNHZJq

if you want to know what happens to us after the game, see a picture of us (and many other references, like the real todoroki doll and my cat), get high-quality versions of all art, see the 35-page planning document, and support me, you can download the "extras" file for $10! (if you do  i will love you forever)
